:• 2x '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''2100 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC2100 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} ?? This product is not yet released but it is mentioned in the FCC documents for the [[Linksys EA8300]]. Most information is copied from that entry. According to the [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA8300/Test-Report/RF-Test-Report-BT-BR-EDR-3297072 RF Test Report BT BR+EDR], "All models are identical except for the EA8300 supports 256QAM and the EA8250 disable 256QAM." "EWW516-A1-BL REV:025(XC) 308.02448.025" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com
